title: The General Theory of Relativity
description: Einstein's General Theory of Relativity, explained in a lean and easy to understand way.You do not need to have skills in theoretical Physics, or in advanced mathematics, to understand this book.Finally a book that let everybody appreciate the great theory of Albert Einstein, that opened the human mind to a deeper comprehension of the universe.C. G. Conrad, PhD in Electronic Engineering, lives in Italy and is author of several books and articles about scientific topics, both in English and in Italian.
author: C.G. Conrad
